name: Space Birds
description:
Space Birds 🐦 

Embark on a short journey for the Queen of Mars 🪐

Birds have disappeared from Mars, but a little elite troop reproduce each year the shapes of flocking birds for the anniversary of their Queen 👸 

Use the power of your Spacebar and your clicks to move your spaceships like birds  🚀

Don't forget to turn on the sound at the bottom left of your screen 🎶 It's disabled by default on web browsers.

Credits

As always, thank you, Kenney, for your assets: spaceships, ground, font, and even particles 🏜

Thank you, Tallbeard, for your wonderful music loop 🎵 I used Track 2 of Ludum Dare 38.
